tool_description:

API Instagram. Get a lot of information from Instagram consistently and quickly! Smart request filtering for 100% response. [Uptime: 98.26%] Need some quick help?  Message me on discussions

api_list.name: Get User Followers

Get Post Comments
api_list.description:
Get comments made on a post. 

Each post has a "pk" key.  To get the comments for a post, send the pk value of that post as media_pk in the url as query parameter
